content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great that you're committed to keeping Luna's litter box clean and comfortable for her.

Remember, consistency is key, so try to stick to your schedule as much as possible. And don't hesitate to adjust it if you notice any changes in Luna's behavior or litter box habits.

Habitica will help you stay on track, and you can even earn rewards and points for completing your daily and weekly tasks!

If you have any more questions or concerns about pet care or habit tracking, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help.

Good luck with your new habit, and I hope Rocky's puppy training classes continue to go well!
